snippet: Eight of the performers fell during a Ringling Brothers “hair hang act” and landed on a dancer below during a show in Providence, officials said.
abstract: Eight circus performers dangling high above ring at Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey circus in Providence, RI, crash some 30 feet to ground when harness suddenly collapsed; performers fall atop dancer in ring below; all nine are taken to hospital, with injuries that do not appear to be life threatening.
lead_paragraph: Eight of the performers fell during a Ringling Brothers “hair hang act” and landed on a dancer below during a show in Providence, officials said.

headline.main: 9 Circus Performers Injured in Fall in Rhode Island
headline.print_headline: Nine in Circus Aerial Act Injured When Harness Collapses

keywords.value: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus
